scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 ede_ranking subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.deploy-demo: graph deploy ede_ranking subgraph.dockerParity.yaml --debug --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001
scripts.deploy:bsctest: graph deploy balancer-labs/balancer-kovan-v2 subgraph.bsctest.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
